proposal: Hey there, SmartContracts Tools community! Congrats on reaching 120 holders on the ETH network, that's no small feat! 🎉 Your focus on decentralized products and services for Web3 is impressive. Ever thought about adding a sprinkle of DEX or a dash of Lottery to your recipe? They're like the salt and pepper of the crypto world, and anyone from your community can deploy them. Let's spice things up together! 🌶️
